strings.Value: "My eyelids are heavy as stones. Don't know if I can guard the camp tonight."
"So exhausted. I must sleep. Could you look after the camp?"
"I must raise my prayers to Groetus, so I'll be too busy to help. Ask someone who's more concerned with worldly things."
"No way! I have to finish the draft of my new chapter. Someone who can't write should guard the camp. â€” There's enough illiterates among us."
"I'm ready to keep watch. Don't worry about that."
"Then sleep well. The swords of your friends will keep you safe."
